projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: CTIG-Diffusion - Text to Image Generation
projects.bodyText: This implementation is based on the paper titled Conditional Text Image Generation with Diffusion Models, which can be found at arXiv:2306.10804v1.

projects.title: Building Blocks
projects.bodyText: Created a package which is a building block for creating a custom python implementation of Algebra, Machine Learning
